ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 124
ygData.msgSnippet: They are mostly toys. They don t do much good or much of anything. So they are just toys so far for high-mid level people who have nothing better to spend
ygData.messageBody:
They are mostly toys. They don't do much good or much of anything.
So they are just toys so far for high-mid level people who have nothing
better to spend their money on.


-Dave

At 11:03 AM 10/24/99 -0300, you wrote:
>From: lockjaw <lockjaw@...>
>
>I don't think the book is very high level, I just have very serious doubt
>that it is.
>
>All of the recipies in it are very simple and easy to do and require
>minimal tinkering skill, but what confuses me is that those gnomes, even in
>light of the third book being posted, are still refusing to share info, and
>are still trying to exort extremely high prices for things. I guess its a
>greed thing...
>
>At anyrate, doesn't it make sense that gnomes who won't tell you recipies
>will also lie to you about how they came about the third book?
>
>Rotgut
>
>>
>
